content.raw:
After those changes I was able to successfully compile all sandia_hand packages under /ros subdirectory. For testing it, I moved the four packages to a *src* subdirectory and run catkin_make, which compiles all four.

However, we should think about what is the best way of compiling the whole package. Create a build inside each one, and run the commands four times, installing them on system under /opt/ros/groovy?

As for packaging, are we planning on distribute them individually?
